name: Word Search Solver
description:
**(Tablet Edition)**

Word Search Solver allows you to quickly find words in any word search puzzle. This app can be used to quickly complete a word search puzzle or just help you find that one word that you have spent a long time looking for. This app is really easy to use. First (1) type in all the letters of the puzzle letter-by-letter and row-by-row on the main screen; Next, (2) press the “Generate Word Search Puzzle” button; (3) Once the puzzle has been generated type the word/phrase you would like to find and press the “Find” button; Finally, (4) the app will find and highlight the word/phrase you are looking for.
